column4: i have another question. Actually i'llhave two, but i'll do one at a time. any reason why DVI wont work on this card but HDMI does?

I see there is a setting in /etc/X11/xorg.conf to activate DVI Find the line that says Section "Screen" Insert a new line that says Option "UseDisplayDevice" "DFP".   as seen in https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/Nvidia
ok i;ll check it out thanks
should I reboot. And do I need to use " " because I saw some other lines that did have that
